title: Pu`uhonua O Hōnaunau National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for how to get involved at Pu'uhonua o Hōnaunau? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.   NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks. Check out 2016 Centennial Events Calendar here.   Partners The Hawai'i Pacific Parks Association helps support interpretive, educational, scientific, cultural, and visitor service programs within the park. With a spirit of aloha, we inspire the discovery and stewardship of the natural and cultural heritage of Pacific Island parks.
